origin.toomanyorigins.dragonborn.name: 龍的後裔
origin.toomanyorigins.dragonborn.descrip: 半人半龍,雖然缺乏終界使者的傳送能力,但他們兇猛的氣息和身體,使終界的居民得向他們鞠躬
origin.toomanyorigins.hisskin.name: Hiss-kin
origin.toomanyorigins.hisskin.descriptio: 對於這種生物是否真的存在，很多人一直爭論不休。在神話中，苦力怕的進化體了控制它們的爆炸，以免傷害周圍的環境作為逃跑的策略。
origin.toomanyorigins.undead.name: 不死生物
origin.toomanyorigins.undead.description: 儘管遭受了感染的影響，但一種罕見的基因突變使這個種族能夠保持人性。
origin.toomanyorigins.withered.name: 凋零
origin.toomanyorigins.withered.descripti: The Withered are those whose ancestors have paid the price for harnessing the chaotic power of the Wither. They can feel the decay within spread to anything they touch.
power.toomanyorigins.dragon_breath.name: 龍息
power.toomanyorigins.dragon_breath.descr: 你可以招換一個刺穿盔甲的龍焰球,無論他落到哪,都會留下揮之不去的雲彩,他還能做為熔爐的燃料
power.toomanyorigins.no_knockback.name: 耐久
power.toomanyorigins.weak_point.name: 虛弱藥水
power.toomanyorigins.weak_point.descript: 你有一個脆弱的地方,彈射物將會對你造成更大的傷害
power.toomanyorigins.zenith_scales.name: 天頂秤
death.attack.dragonMagic.player: %1$s was roasted in dragon breath whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.dragonMagic.player.item: %1$s was roasted in dragon breath whilst trying to escape %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.indirectDragonMagic: %1$s was roasted in dragon breath by %2$s
power.toomanyorigins.overheat.name: 過度加熱
power.toomanyorigins.overheat.descriptio: 你可以從你眼前的任何物體上快速跳躍。這會點燃你內心的火藥，在這個過程中你將會受傷。
power.toomanyorigins.blast_immunity.name: 爆炸抗性
power.toomanyorigins.blast_immunity.desc: 你免疫所有的爆炸傷害
power.toomanyorigins.conductor.name: 導體
power.toomanyorigins.conductor.descripti: 被閃電擊中時你將會充能(就像閃電苦力怕那樣 嗯嗯)
power.toomanyorigins.sneaking_steps.name: 偷偷摸摸的步驟
power.toomanyorigins.sneaking_steps.desc: 你習慣了偷偷摸摸的方式,這會使你的速度變慢
power.toomanyorigins.ailurophobia.name: 恐懼症
power.toomanyorigins.ailurophobia.descri: 靠近豹貓或貓會讓你變得虛弱無比,也將會變得非常慢
death.attack.overheat.player: %1$s incinerated their insides whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.overheat.player.item: %1$s incinerated their insides whilst trying to escape %2$s using %3$s
power.toomanyorigins.deathly_bite.name: 死亡之咬
power.toomanyorigins.deathly_bite.descri: 你的近戰攻擊會在短時間內對非亡靈生物造成殭屍化效果。擊中任何村民會使他們有殭屍化效果
power.toomanyorigins.no_helmet_burn.name: 不死族
power.toomanyorigins.no_helmet_burn.desc: 在1分30秒後,除非你有帶頭盔否則你將會燃燒
power.toomanyorigins.cannibalism.name: 同類相食
power.toomanyorigins.cannibalism.descrip: 腐肉對你恢復更多的肌餓值
power.toomanyorigins.opposite_day.name: 相反天
power.toomanyorigins.opposite_day.descri: 立即治療和立即傷害有著相反的效果.你免疫再生 飢餓 殭屍化.
power.toomanyorigins.torn_lungs.name: 壞掉的肺
power.toomanyorigins.torn_lungs.descript: 您的精力消耗比其他人快，因此需要多吃些。
death.attack.zombification.player: %1$s rotted away whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.zombification.player.item: %1$s rotted away whilst trying to escape %2$s using %3$s
power.toomanyorigins.black_thumb.name: 黑手指
power.toomanyorigins.black_thumb.descrip: 你附近的農作物將會無法生長
你有著靈魂疾走的附魔(1級)
power.toomanyorigins.soul_shield.name: 靈魂盾牌
power.toomanyorigins.soul_shield.descrip: 當您處於最大生命值的 50% 或以下時，您會在自己周圍創建一個靈魂盾牌，使自己能夠抵抗傷害並免疫投射物。
power.toomanyorigins.wither_toxins.name: 凋零的毒
power.toomanyorigins.wither_toxins.descr: 你進戰攻擊會造成短時間的凋零效果
